title: NPR's Captivating Serial Podcast Is Heading to TV
text:
Published By: TV Guide - Yesterday 
NPR's hit Serial is making the move from your iPhone to your television.The true-crime podcast, a spin-off of NPR's This American Life, is b... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
